title: The Object Lessons
content:
Do you know the name of this fonts or something that similar, thank you very much.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [The Object Lessons.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819223146/http:/typophile.com/files/The%20Object%20Lessons.jpg) | 221.01 KB |
author: manukball

comments.content:
Those are very Jan van Krimpen-ish.  
Have a look at [Romulus](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819223146/http:/www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/Romulus_rdrct.html) for ‘THE OBJECT LESSONS’, [Romulus Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819223146/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/20994543@N04/4565103124/in/set-72157623960702602/) for ‘Nina Beier and Marie Lund’ and [Cancelleresca Bastarda](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819223146/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/20994543@N04/4564472427/sizes/l/in/photostream/) for ‘by Francesco Pedraglio’.
